column4: hm, the candybar desklet is neat, but I wish you could make it larger
anyone have a clue why unreal tournament 2004 would have no sound, unless I launched it from a terminal?
i created a shortcut to it in gnome, and when I use that, there's no sound, however, when I navigate to the directory and do ./ut2004 , the sound works
does the shortcut properly set the working directory?
